text:
Company: Santos, Hahn and Mason

Job Title: Program Manager Global Pricing

About Us:
Santos, Hahn and Mason is a leading global consulting firm that specializes in pricing strategies for multinational corporations. We believe in fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and inclusivity.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Program Manager to lead our Global Pricing team. The successful candidate will be responsible for developing and implementing pricing strategies that drive business growth and revenue optimization.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and execute global pricing strategies across multiple regions and product lines
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business opportunities and drive revenue growth
- Analyze market trends and competitor pricing to inform strategic decisions
- Manage and mentor a team of pricing analysts and coordinators
- Communicate pricing strategies to internal stakeholders and external clients

Qualifications:

- 5+ years of experience in pricing, finance, or management consulting
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and project management skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities
- Conversant in multiple languages is an asset

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive health and wellness benefits
- Opportunities for professional development and growth
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
